title: Inconsistent behavior between fmt and if clause
body:
The following issue is reproducible on both Mac OS X (amd64, go 1.5.1) and play.golang.org.

Code: http://play.golang.org/p/P53HkYdxyU

In the code above, nil value of *B is casted to interface IB. fmt correctly recognize the instance of IB is nil, but if clause fails to detect it, causing unnecessary confusing.
